channel.title: Fixing My Handler
channel.description:
Ok, so I am making a new handler for my server to help with mass buying, and I'm calling it exchange.java. Well, I already had this is my client.java, but it made it too big. Here can you help me fix this?
[CODE]location: class Exchange deleteItem(995,getItemSlot(995), 100000); ^ Exchange.java:20: cannot find symbol symbol : method GetItemName(int) location: class Exchange sendMessage("You exchanged 100K for a " + GetItemName(1305) + " !"); ^ Exchange.java:20: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class Exchange sendMessage("You exchanged 100K for a " + GetItemName(1305) + " !"); ^ Exchange.java:21: cannot find symbol symbol : method addItem(int,int) location: class Exchange addItem(1305, 1); ^ Exchange.java:23: cannot find symbol symbol : variable player location: class Exchange if(player.HasItem2(995)) ^ Exchange.java:24: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class Exchange sendMessage("Get More Cash! XD"); ^ Exchange.java:27: cannot find symbol symbol : variable a location: class Exchange client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[a]; ^ Exchange.java:30: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItemSlot(int) location: class Exchange deleteItem(995,getItemSlot(995), 1600000); ^ Exchange.java:31: cannot find symbol symbol : method GetItemName(int) location: class Exchange sendMessage("You exchanged 1.6M for a " + GetItemName(4151) + " !"); ^ Exchange.java:31: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class Exchange sendMessage("You exchanged 1.6M for a " + GetItemName(4151) + " !"); ^ Exchange.java:32: cannot find symbol symbol : method addItem(int,int) location: class Exchange addItem(4151, 1); ^ Exchange.java:34: cannot find symbol symbol : variable player location: class Exchange if(player.HasItem2(995)) ^ Exchange.java:35: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class Exchange sendMessage("Get More Cash! XD"); ^ Exchange.java:38: cannot find symbol symbol : variable a location: class Exchange client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[a]; ^ Exchange.java:39: cannot find symbol symbol : variable player location: class Exchange if (player.HasItemAmount(995, 3000000)) ^ Exchange.java:41: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItemSlot(int) location: class Exchange deleteItem(995,getItemSlot(995), 3000000); ^ Exchange.java:42: cannot find symbol symbol : method GetItemName(int) location: class Exchange sendMessage("You exchanged 3M for a " + GetItemName(6585) + " !"); ^ Exchange.java:42: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class Exchange sendMessage("You exchanged 3M for a " + GetItemName(6585) + " !"); ^ Exchange.java:43: cannot find symbol symbol : method addItem(int,int) location: class Exchange addItem(6585, 1); ^ Exchange.java:45: cannot find symbol symbol : variable player location: class Exchange if(player.HasItem2(995)) ^ Exchange.java:46: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class Exchange sendMessage("Get More Cash! XD"); ^ Exchange.java:49: cannot find symbol symbol : variable player location: class Exchange if (player.HasItemAmount(995, 300000000)) ^ Exchange.java:51: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItemSlot(int) location: class Exchange deleteItem(995,getItemSlot(995), 300000000); ^ Exchange.java:52: cannot find symbol symbol : method GetItemName(int) location: class Exchange sendMessage("You exchanged 3M for a " + GetItemName(15333) + " !"); ^ Exchange.java:52: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class Exchange sendMessage("You exchanged 3M for a " + GetItemName(15333) + " !"); ^ Exchange.java:53: cannot find symbol symbol : method addItem(int,int) location: class Exchange addItem(15333, 1); ^ Exchange.java:55: cannot find symbol symbol : variable player location: class Exchange if(player.HasItem2(995)) ^ Exchange.java:56: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class Exchange sendMessage("Get More Cash! XD"); ^ Exchange.java:59: cannot find symbol symbol : variable player location: class Exchange if (player.HasItemAmount(995, 300000000)) ^ Exchange.java:61: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItemSlot(int) location: class Exchange deleteItem(995,getItemSlot(995), 300000000); ^ Exchange.java:62: cannot find symbol symbol : method GetItemName(int) location: class Exchange sendMessage("You exchanged 3M for a " + GetItemName(15334) + " !"); ^ Exchange.java:62: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class Exchange sendMessage("You exchanged 3M for a " + GetItemName(15334) + " !"); ^ Exchange.java:63: cannot find symbol symbol : method addItem(int,int) location: class Exchange addItem(15334, 1); ^ Exchange.java:65: cannot find symbol symbol : variable player location: class Exchange if(player.HasItem2(995)) ^ Exchange.java:66: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class Exchange sendMessage("Get More Cash! XD"); ^ Exchange.java:103: cannot find symbol symbol : variable actionAmount location: class Exchange actionAmount++; ^ Exchange.java:109: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerRights location: class Exchange if(playerRights >= 0) { ^ server.java:40: cannot find symbol symbol : method process() location: class Exchange Exchange.process(); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 60 errors ------------------------------------------ --The dreadful Deed is done!-- ------------------------------------------ Press any key to continue . . .[/CODE]
EDIT: I'm not sure how to add the methods XD =]

item.title: Fixing My Handler
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

Ok, so I am making a new handler for my server to help with mass buying, and I’m calling it exchange.java. Well, I already had this is my client.java, but it made it too big. Here can you help me fix this?

[CODE]location: class Exchange
deleteItem(995,getItemSlot(995), 100000);
^
